name: Water Reuse Europe
goal: Water Reuse Europe is an industry-focused association providing a collective identity for the European water reuse sector and a focal point for nurturing innovation and best practice. As such, it represents the European sector’s interests, views, and aspirations and stimulates its growth and competitiveness through a range of initiatives. The association supports its members by facilitating the sharing of knowledge, techniques, research, and experiences as well as by promoting European expertise and solutions in water reuse to global markets. Through its outreach programme, Water Reuse Europe raises public awareness and understanding of water reuse practices and promotes the safe and effective use of recycled water.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
EU initiative on water reuse;
EU water reuse action plan;
Guidelines on Integrating Water Reuse into Water Planning and Management in the context of the WFD;
Circular Economy Action Plan;
EU programmes and initiatives on water, wastewater, resource recovery and the circular economy;
Water and wastewater policies.
